scripts.start: pnpm -r --filter @westfam/shared build && pnpm --filter tile-proxy build && pnpm --filter @westfam/alerts build && pnpm --filter weather-web build && concurrently -n proxy,web -c blue,green "pnpm --filter tile-proxy start" "pnpm --filter weather-web start"
scripts.build: pnpm -r --filter @westfam/shared build && pnpm --filter tile-proxy build && pnpm --filter @westfam/alerts build && pnpm --filter weather-web build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter tile-proxy test && pnpm --filter @westfam/alerts test && pnpm --filter @westfam/shared test && pnpm --filter weather-web test
scripts.typecheck: pnpm -w exec tsc -b web services/proxy services/alerts services/shared --pretty false
